Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You've got two battle axes and all your equipment is|upgraded! Awesome! Also[;] you're extremely cursed!
Rules Description: Start with two upgraded [yellow]Battle Axes[].|All equipment you find is upgraded.|Inflicted with [curse]Curse[] at the start of every turn.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield+~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang+~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash+~[;]~Equipment:Pirate Hook+~|~Equipment:Midnight Charm+~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You seem pretty tough! Do you really need all that health?|Nah[;] you'll be fine without it.
Rules Description: Start with a [yellow]Venus Fly Trap[].|Lose [heart]2[] max hp when you level up.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Midnight Charm~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Equipment:Last Stand~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Start Game: Rules.hpchangeonlevelup = -2;  Rules.substitute(~Midnight Charm~[;] ~Iron Shield~); Rules.lowhpmusic = false;

Description: You've got your usual equipment[;] usual health[;] everything.|It's a shame all your enemies have extra health and|upgraded weapons.
Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|All enemy equipment is upgraded.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Crescent Moon Blade~[;]~Equipment:Polar Star~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Battering Ram~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: chooseinitialequipment([~InitialEquipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~InitialEquipment:Katana~[;]~InitialEquipment:Sword~[;] ~InitialEquipment:Rusty Sword~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Boxing Gloves[;]Boxing Gloves~[;]~InitialEquipment:Battle Axe~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Claw[;]Claw~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Boomerang[;]Small Shield~]); leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards1 = [~Equipment:Crescent Moon Blade~[;] ~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;] ~Equipment:Polar Star~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~[;]~Equipment:Katana~]; var rewards2 = [~Equipment:Battering Ram~[;] ~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Equipment:Sabre~[;] ~Equipment:Candle~[;]~Equipment:Polar Star~]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } for(r in rewards2){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards2.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [rewards2.pop()[;] ~Upgrade~]); }
